sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Body, CardArticle, Container, ContainerArticle, Header, Title, Thumbnail, TitleArticle, Description, BodyArticle, BodyText, CardInfo, ContainerEdit, Icon, } from "../styled/Home"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faPencil, faTrash } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { UseDataContext } from "../context/context"; export default function HomePage() { const { auth, user, handleLogout } = UseDataContext(); useEffect(() => {}, [auth]); const dados = [ { id: "1", title: "Artigo 1", description: "Descicao do artigo 1", body: "texto completo do artigo", create_at: "", thumbnail: "https://media.glassdoor.com/sqll/3762982/atom6-design-squarelogo-1607449561246.png", }, { id: "2", title: "Artigo 2", description: "Descicao do artigo 2", body: "texto completo do artigo", create_at: "", thumbnail: "https://media.glassdoor.com/sqll/3762982/atom6-design-squarelogo-1607449561246.png", }, ]; return (
Seja Bem Vindo! {user} CRUD
{dados.map((item, i) => ( {item.title} {item.description} {item.body} ))}
); }
